title: Is there any Dua to be recited after finishing the Quran? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Oh Samus third question is do you have any voluntary deeds that I can participate for Lackey is ecolo here but I'm afraid we don't have any volunteers because we don't have an organization or a setup for volunteers all what I have is a small team of sisters have never met in my life and I don't know them and zama here they take care of my youtube my Facebook and my website in terms of organizing it and sending me the questions and managing it but other than that I'm afraid we don't have any volunteer work for you may Allah make it easier for you and for us
